name: react-parse-htmlstring
description: Parse any string and return a React component on a html container of your choice!

scripts.clean: rimraf dist lib node_modules demo/dist demo/node_modules
scripts.build: yarn install && yarn run build:production && cd demo && yarn install && yarn run build && cd ..
scripts.postrelease: git push --follow-tags && npm publish && cd demo && yarn upgrade react-parse-htmlstring@latest && cd .. && yarn run demo:publish
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && yarn run release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && yarn run release
scripts.release:major: npm version major && yarn run release
scripts.demo:build: cd demo && yarn install && yarn run build
scripts.demo:push: cd demo/dist && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update demo' && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am 'update demo' && git push git@github.com:jaosimt/react-parse-htmlstring gh-pages --force
scripts.demo:publish: yarn run demo:clean && yarn run demo:build && yarn run demo:push

author: Sim Jao
